Detailed Description

template<typename MCSignType, typename MCStepType = Step::Metropolis<MCSignType>>
class triqs::mc_tools::mc_generic< MCSignType, MCStepType >

Generic Monte Carlo class.

template<typename MCSignType , typename MCStepType = Step::Metropolis<MCSignType>>
template<typename MoveType >
void triqs::mc_tools::mc_generic< MCSignType, MCStepType >::add_move ( MoveType &&  M,
std::string  name,
double  proposition_probability = 1.0 
) [inline]

Register move M with its probability of being proposed. NB : the proposition_probability needs to be >0 but does not need to be normalized. Normalization is automatically done with all the added moves before starting the run
